reviewText: It's his Christmas present so I don't have a review.  Since I can't post it again...  Never grasped the magnitude of how Korea still hates the USA until I saw the Natl Geo film on North Korea.  It's an insane/terrifying country.  Not politically correct, but it would have been a God send if our bombing could have changed the lives of those poor starving/brainwashed people.  Still is the highlight of my dad's life - taking off from a carrier in a jet fighter plane & dropped bombs...
